OOC: She's not appraoching, merely covering Windlord.

The lady bot sees the grenade coming in. At the last moment, she 
engages jets to get as far as possible from the blast. However, she 
is not far enough and gets thrown right besides the weakened Windlord.

Starstomp: I have to say... these guys are tough...

She aims her chain gun and fires 25 slugs at Bombshell.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Narrator" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Bombshell jumps and somersaults through the air, coming down to be 
struck on the shoulder by the final cannon blast.
> 
> Bombshell: Blah!
> 
> He fired one of his signature accurate long range grenades at 
Starstomp, discontinuing his approach...
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: warriorazure 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Wednesday, January 23, 2002 6:35 PM
>   Subject: Re: War in Chivtrons Base/Help for Windlord
> 
> 
>   Seeing that the two incoming missiles were closing in fast, 
Starstomp 
>   gets between them and Windlord, catching the missiles fully.
> 
>   Starstomp: Ouch... That hurts...
> 
>   She fires 4 cannon blasts at Bombshell.
> 
>   --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Narrator" <thecode@p...> wrote:
>   > The Insecticons avoided about half of the thirty five shots 
Windlord 
>   fired at them. Someone starts thinking that more characters need 
to 
>   get out into the battle and help the Chivtrons, because breaking 
the 
>   max shot rule bugs certain people.
>   > 
>   > Bombshell: That one can't last forever, all alone. It makes me 
feel 
>   EEEVIL!
>   > 
>   > Bombshell charges across the battlefield to get up close to 
>   Windlord. Barrage fires another 2 missiles at Windlord...
>   >

>   > 
>   >   Windlord tried to avoid the attacks that all his enemies did 
but 
>   he 
>   >   couldn't. He was hit by most of the shots of Insecticons' 
guns; 
>   >   Windlord tried to aim and di ficulty fired 5 shot to each 
>   >   Insecticons. Barrimore and Macgowan's Missiles stuck and 
damaged 
>   >   Windlord's wings while he tried to cover himself, while his 
wounds 
>   >   and Virgo's dart made him feel more and more weak.
>   > 
>   >   Quetzalcoatl looked how Windlord was fithgthing for his life 
"Let 
>   be 
>   >   him alone!!!!"shouted anger the male while he took off and 
flew 
>   >   towards the hawk male. While he did that, Quetzalcoatl shot 
two 
>   >   feather missiles: one to Barrimore and other to Virgo.

his
